mapper.select: select id, cmmit_date, pat_name, sex, age, tel, card_type, card_id, health_id from buss_dual_referral where dr_id_from = #{busDualReferral.drIdFrom} and ref_type != 1 GROUP BY pat_name , tel ORDER BY id DESC

mapper.update:
update buss_dual_referral
cmmit_date = #{cmmitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pat_name = #{patName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id_from = #{orgIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name_from = #{orgNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name_from = #{deptNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id_from = #{deptIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_id_from = #{drIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_name_from = #{drNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_tel = #{drTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id_to = #{orgIdTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name_to = #{orgNameTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_id_to = #{drIdTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_name_to = #{drNameTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dr_mobile_to = #{drMobelTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_type = #{refType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_status = #{refStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_full_name = #{fileFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
health_id = #{healthId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icd10 = #{icd10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diag = #{diag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id_to = #{deptIdTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name_to = #{deptNameTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
clinic_lsh = #{clinicLsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
illness_description = #{illnessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_url_img = #{inUrlImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_url_img = #{outUrlImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feedback = #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intention_depart = #{intentionDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update buss_dual_referral set cmmit_date = #{cmmitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pat_name = #{patName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id_from = #{orgIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name_from = #{orgNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name_from = #{deptNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id_from = #{deptIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr_id_from = #{drIdFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr_name_from = #{drNameFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dr_tel = #{drTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id_to = #{orgIdTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name_to = #{orgNameTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_type = #{refType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_status = #{refStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_full_name = #{fileFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, health_id = #{healthId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icd10 = #{icd10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diag = #{diag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id_to = #{deptIdTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name_to = #{deptNameTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, clinic_lsh = #{clinicLsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} illness_description = #{illnessDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR} in_url_img = #{inUrlImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} out_url_img = #{outUrlImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} intention_depart = #{intentionDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
